item.description:
Our January meeting had us warming up to music and then stretching on the floor. Stretching is essential to reduce the pain of Fibromyalgia.

February's meeting will be at 7:15PM, as will all future meetings until June. Please note the change. At our February get together Betsy will be discussing diet and fibromyalgia and how important it can be to your health and recovery.

See you on the 12th!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be the one running around setting up the chairs!
item.name: The Reading Fibromyalgia February Meetup
